EmailTemplate.description: Updates pax list with pre-work status
EmailTemplate.name: Updates pax list with pre-work status - V2.0
EmailTemplate.subject: Updates pax list with pre-work status for {!Job__c.Account_Name__c} program on {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Cc Marketer
Hi {!Job__c.Facilitator_names__c}
Please find attached the latest participant list with pre-work status for the {!Job__c.Account_Name__c}, {!Job__c.Certificate_Date_Text__c} program.
As part of the ENSI Quality Assurance, please complete the attached ENSI Peer/Self Review form after the workshop and return to me. (Solo facilitators will complete a self-assessment and dual facilitators will peer review each other)
All the best
